titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress regarding the primary author and the official home of "Yankee Doodle".
Expressing the sense of Congress regarding the primary author and the official home of "Yankee Doodle".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of Congress that: (1) Dr. Richard Shuckburgh should be recognized and honored as the primary author of "Yankee Doodle"; and (2) Fort Crailo, in the city of Rensselaer, New York, should be recognized as the "Home of Yankee Doodle."
